### getCompareLoadPairs() {#a55c2bd491febc53c59b65876ec99b702}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ExpandMemCmp.cpp&#125;::MemCmpExpansion::getCompareLoadPairs (unsigned BlockIndex, unsigned &amp; LoadIndex)</>}>
Generate an equality comparison for one or more pairs of loaded values.

This is used in the case where the <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/mergeicmps-cpp/#affd23ab4a2fbb796128b383986b7286f">memcmp()</a> call is compared equal or not equal to zero.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandmemcmp-cpp/#l00110">110</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandmemcmp-cpp">ExpandMemCmp.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getLoadPair() {#ad2f7eac6aace5aaf0eaaf9b9af143c2c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MemCmpExpansion::LoadPair anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ExpandMemCmp.cpp&#125;::MemCmpExpansion::getLoadPair (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; LoadSizeType, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; BSwapSizeType, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; CmpSizeType, unsigned OffsetBytes)</>}>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandmemcmp-cpp/#l00123">123</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandmemcmp-cpp">ExpandMemCmp.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getMemCmpEqZeroOneBlock() {#a00a90f77f10266a653c94b8231a632fe}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ExpandMemCmp.cpp&#125;::MemCmpExpansion::getMemCmpEqZeroOneBlock ()</>}>
A memcmp expansion that compares equality with 0 and only has one block of load and compare can bypass the compare, branch, and phi IR that is required in the general case.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandmemcmp-cpp/#l00117">117</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandmemcmp-cpp">ExpandMemCmp.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getMemCmpExpansionZeroCase() {#aed49c6f0d7e72aeb967429b73537bcb2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ExpandMemCmp.cpp&#125;::MemCmpExpansion::getMemCmpExpansionZeroCase ()</>}>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandmemcmp-cpp/#l00116">116</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandmemcmp-cpp">ExpandMemCmp.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getMemCmpOneBlock() {#a0d1b97df50490a492f66b35fbfbd528d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ExpandMemCmp.cpp&#125;::MemCmpExpansion::getMemCmpOneBlock ()</>}>
A memcmp expansion that only has one block of load and compare can bypass the compare, branch, and phi IR that is required in the general case.

This function also analyses users of memcmp, and if there is only one user from which we can conclude that only 2 out of 3 memcmp outcomes really matter, then it generates more efficient code with only one comparison.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandmemcmp-cpp/#l00118">118</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandmemcmp-cpp">ExpandMemCmp.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandmemcmp-cpp/#l00109">109</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandmemcmp-cpp">ExpandMemCmp.cpp</a>.

### LoadCmpBlocks {#a56fa0505344014c008c1f228f7f41494}
